tags.name: ccl-comp-table
tags.description: An element that loads brand data from files and displays it in a comparison table.

attributes.name: src-file
attributes.description: File path from which to load brand list for comparison.

attributes.name: src-prop
attributes.description: Property name for brand list in source file.

tags.name: ccl-nutrition-facts
tags.description: An element that loads nutrition facts from a file and displays them fda label format.

attributes.name: src-file
attributes.description: File path from which to load nutrition data.

attributes.name: src-prop
attributes.description: Property name of nutrition data in source file.
